title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 24.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 24.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the procedures and
criteria to be used in selecting and retaining experts to diagnose competitive
problems of specific industrial firms or groups of firms, to recommend remedial
measures, and to perform other industrial effectiveness assistance under the
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
24.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
